author: 🌈
text: It's Valentine's day, you don't have a lover , it's mother's day your mom is no more, it's father's day You and your dad don't have a relationship, it's Christmas your family is toxic, sometimes these days that celebrate love can just be another day,oh well.

author: 🌈
text: You should also stop venting to people who never vent to you no matter how much you trust them. Cause it's like them never venting to you is them not trusting you while you can tell them anything. Be careful.
